content.question: The work on the right reflects an interest in

choices.label: accurately copying figures and subject matter from nature
aligning the Old Testament and the New Testament through typology
emphasizing the role of the saints in the church
asserting imperial authority over the church

content.answer: aligning the Old Testament and the New Testament through typology

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
